verses.verse: <WG2424> And Jesus <WG1161> Of The Spirit <WG4151> Holy <WG40> Full, <WG4134> Returned <WG5290> From <WG575> The <WG3588> Jordan, <WG2446> And <WG2532> Was Led <WG71> By <WG1722> The <WG3588> Spirit <WG4151> Into <WG1519> The <WG3588> Wilderness <WG2048>

And <WG2532> Answering <WG611> Him <WG846> Said <WG2036> <WG3588> Jesus, <WG2424> Get Thee <WG5217> Behind <WG3694>, Me, <WG3450> Satan; <WG4567> <WG1125> For It Has Been Written, <WG1063> Thou Shalt Worship The <WG4352> Lord <WG2962> <WG3588> <WG2316> Thy God, <WG4675> And <WG2532> Him <WG846> Only <WG3441> Shalt Thou Serve. <WG3000>

And <WG2532> He Led <WG71> Him <WG846> To <WG1519> Jerusalem, <WG2419> And <WG2532> Set <WG2476> Him <WG846> Upon <WG1909> The <WG3588> Edge <WG4419> Of The <WG3588> Temple, <WG2411> And <WG2532> Said <WG2036> To Him, <WG846> If <WG1487> The <WG3588> Son <WG5207> Thou Art <WG1488> <WG3588> Of God, <WG2316> Cast <WG906> Thyself <WG4572> Hence <WG1782> Down; <WG2736>

And <WG2532> Having Finished <WG4931> Every <WG3956> Temptation <WG3986> The <WG3588> Devil <WG1228> Departed <WG868> ' From <WG575> <WG846> Him <WG891> For A Time. <WG2540>

And <WG2532> There Was Given <WG1929> To Him The <WG846> Book <WG975> Of Isaiah <WG2268> The <WG3588> Prophet, <WG4396> And <WG2532> Having Unrolled <WG380> The <WG3588> Book <WG975> He Found <WG2147> The <WG3588> Place <WG5117> Where <WG3757> It Was <WG2258> Written, <WG1125>

To Proclaim The <WG2784> Year <WG1763> Of The Lord <WG2962> Acceptable. <WG1184>

<WG756> And He Began <WG1161> To Say <WG3004> To <WG4314> <WG846> Them, <WG3754> Today <WG4594> Is Fulfilled <WG4137> <WG3588> <WG1124> This Scripture <WG3778> In <WG1722> <WG3588> <WG3775> Your Ears. <WG5216>

And <WG2532> All <WG3956> Bore Witness <WG3140> To Him, <WG846> And <WG2532> Wondered <WG2296> At <WG1909> The <WG3588> Words <WG3056> <WG3588> Of Grace <WG5485> Which <WG3588> Proceeded <WG1607> Out Of <WG1537> <WG3588> <WG4750> His Mouth; <WG846> And <WG2532> They Said, <WG3004> Not <WG3756> This <WG3778> Is <WG2076> The <WG3588> Son <WG5207> Of Joseph? <WG2501>

<WG2036> But He Said, <WG1161> Verily <WG281> I Say <WG3004> To You, <WG5213> That <WG3754> No <WG3762> Prophet <WG4396> Acceptable <WG1184> Is <WG2076> In <WG1722> <WG3588> <WG3968> His Own Country. <WG846>

' In <WG1909> <WG225> But Truth <WG1161> I Say <WG3004> To You, <WG5213> Many <WG4183> Widows <WG5503> Were <WG2258> In <WG1722> The <WG3588> Days <WG2250> <WG2243> Of Elijah <WG1722> <WG3588> Israel, <WG2474> When <WG3753> Was Shut Up <WG2808> The <WG3588> Heaven <WG3772> For <WG1909> Years <WG2094> Three <WG5140> And <WG2532> Months <WG3376> Six, <WG1803> When <WG5613> There Was <WG1096> A Famine <WG3042> Great <WG3173> Upon <WG1909> All <WG3956> The <WG3588> Land, <WG1093>

And <WG2532> To <WG4314> None <WG3762> Of Them <WG846> Was Sent <WG3992> <WG2243> Elijah <WG1487> Except <WG3361> To <WG1519> Zarephath <WG4558> <WG3588> Of Sidon, <WG4605> To <WG4314> A Woman <WG1135> Widow. <WG5503>

And <WG2532> Were Filled <WG4130> All <WG3956> With Indignation <WG2372> In <WG1722> The <WG3588> Synagogue, <WG4864> Hearing <WG191> These Things; <WG5023>

<WG846> But He <WG1161> Passing <WG1330> Through The <WG1223> Midst <WG3319> Of Them <WG846> Went Away. <WG4198>

And <WG2532> In <WG1722> The <WG3588> Synagogue <WG4864> Was <WG2258> A Man <WG444> Having <WG2192> A Spirit <WG4151> Of A Demon <WG1140> Unclean; <WG169> And <WG2532> He Cried Out <WG349> With A Voice <WG5456> Loud, <WG3173>

And <WG2532> Came <WG1096> Astonishment <WG2285> Upon <WG1909> All, <WG3956> And <WG2532> They Spoke <WG4814> To <WG4314> One Another, <WG240> Saying, <WG3004> What <WG5101> <WG3588> Word Is <WG3056> This, <WG3778> That <WG3754> With <WG1722> Authority <WG1849> And <WG2532> Power <WG1411> He Commands <WG2004> The <WG3588> Unclean <WG169> Spirits, <WG4151> And <WG2532> They Come Out? <WG1831>

<WG450> And Rising Up <WG1161> Out Of <WG1537> The <WG3588> Synagogue <WG4864> He Entered <WG1525> Into <WG1519> The <WG3588> House <WG3614> Of Simon. <WG4613> The <WG3588> Mother - In - Law <WG3994> And <WG1161> <WG3588> Of Simon <WG4613> Was <WG2258> Oppressed With <WG4912> A Fever <WG4446> Great; <WG3173> And <WG2532> They Asked <WG2065> Him <WG846> For <WG4012> Her. <WG846>

And <WG2532> Standing <WG2186> Over <WG1883> Her <WG846> He Rebuked <WG2008> The <WG3588> Fever, <WG4446> And <WG2532> It Left <WG863> Her; <WG846> <WG3916> And Immediately <WG1161> Arising <WG450> She Served <WG1247> Them. <WG846>

<WG1416> And At The Going Down <WG1161> Of The <WG3588> Sun <WG2246> All <WG3956> As Many As <WG3745> Had Persons <WG2192> Sick <WG770> With Diseases <WG3554> Various <WG4164> Brought <WG71> Them <WG846> To <WG4314> Him, <WG846> <WG3588> And He <WG1161> On One <WG1520> Each <WG1538> Of Them <WG846> <WG3588> Hands <WG5495>, Having Laid <WG2007> Healed <WG2323> Them; <WG846>

<WG1831> And Went Out <WG1161> Also <WG2532> Demons <WG1140> From <WG575> Many, <WG4183> Crying Out <WG2896> And <WG2532> <WG3004> Saying, <WG3754> Thou <WG4771> Art <WG1488> The <WG3588> Christ <WG5547> The <WG3588> Son <WG5207> <WG3588> Of God. <WG2316> And <WG2532> Rebuking <WG2008> <WG3756> He Suffered Not <WG1439> Them <WG846> To Speak <WG2980> Because <WG3754> They Knew <WG1492> The <WG3588> Christ <WG5547> Him <WG846> To Be. <WG1511>

<WG1096> And Being Come <WG1161> Day <WG2250> Having Gone Out <WG1831> He Went <WG4198> Into <WG1519> A Desert <WG2048> Place, <WG5117> And <WG2532> The <WG3588> Crowds <WG3793> Sought <WG2212> Him, <WG846> And <WG2532> Came <WG2064> Up To <WG2193> Him <WG846> And <WG2532> Were Detaining <WG2722> <WG846> <WG3588> Him <WG3361> That He Might Not Go <WG4198> ' From <WG575> Them. <WG846>

<WG3588> But He <WG1161> Said <WG2036> To <WG4314> <WG846> Them, <WG3754> Also <WG2532> To The <WG3588> Other <WG2087> Cities <WG4172> <WG2097> To Announce The Glad Tidings <WG3165> It Behooves Me, <WG1163> The <WG3588> Kingdom <WG932> <WG3588> Of God; <WG2316> Because <WG3754> For <WG1519> This <WG5124> Have I Been Sent Forth. <WG649>
And <WG2532> He Was <WG2258> Preaching <WG2784> In <WG1722> The <WG3588> Synagogues <WG4864> <WG3588> Of Galilee. <WG1056>
